topic.title: How to Change the Page Settings for a Specific Element

keywords.indexterm: Page size Change setting for an element

body.p: Suppose your publication is mainly using a portrait page orientation, but there are some topics that have wide images. To avoid having the images bleeding outside of the page, you could use a wider page setting (landscape).

ol.li: Mark the topic with an outputclass attribute and give it a distinct value (for example, wide).
